name: high-availability-40779
element:
<high-availability>
          <interface>
            <ha1>
              <ip-address>{{ h1_ip }}</ip-address>
              <netmask>255.255.255.252</netmask>
              <encryption>
                <enabled>{{ encryption }}</enabled>
              </encryption>
            </ha1>
            <ha1-backup>
              <port>{{ interface_h1_backup }}</port>
              <ip-address>{{ h1_backup_ip }}</ip-address>
              <netmask>255.255.255.252</netmask>
            </ha1-backup>
            <ha2/>
            <ha2-backup>
              <port>{{ interface_h2_backup }}</port>
            </ha2-backup>
            <ha3/>
          </interface>
          <group>
            <group-id>2</group-id>
            <peer-ip>{{ h1_remote_ip }}</peer-ip>
            <peer-ip-backup>{{ h1_remote_backup_ip }}</peer-ip-backup>
            <election-option>
              <preemptive>yes</preemptive>
              <timers>
                <recommended/>
              </timers>
              <device-priority>50</device-priority>
            </election-option>
          </group>
          <enabled>yes</enabled>
        </high-availability>
